titles.title: Livestock Regulatory Protection Act of 2021
A bill to amend the Clean Air Act to prohibit the issuance of permits under title V of that Act for certain emissions from agricultural production.
Livestock Regulatory Protection Act of 2021

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.
Committee on Environment and Public Works. Hearings held.

bill.summary:
Livestock Regulatory Protection Act of 2021
This bill prohibits the Environmental Protection Agency from issuing permits under the Clean Air Act for any carbon dioxide, nitrogen oxide, water vapor, or methane emissions resulting from biological processes associated with livestock production.
